name: astuto
description: Astuto is an open-source feedback platform that lets users vote on feature requests and view development progress. It helps product teams transparently share roadmap updates and manage customer feedback.
features: Feedback Platform: Collect and organize customer feature requests. Listen to your users.
Voting System: Let users vote on features they want most. Prioritize democratically.
Roadmap Sharing: Transparently share development progress and plans. Build trust.
Status Updates: Keep users informed about feature development stages. Clear communication.
Self-Hosted: Own your feedback data and customer relationships. Complete control.
Product Management: Help teams make data-driven product decisions. Build what matters.
